TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit AuthenticatedStream extends System.IO.Stream
Public MustInherit Class AuthenticatedStream Inherits Stream
public ref class AuthenticatedStream abstract : System::IO::Stream

summary.span: 提供在整個資料流中傳遞認證以及要求或執行主從式應用程式驗證的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for passing credentials across a stream and requesting or performing authentication for client-server applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此抽象類別會提供方法和屬性通用於已驗證的資料流。This abstract class provides methods and properties that are common to authenticated streams. 已驗證的資料流可以提供驗證、 資料簽章，與加密服務，可協助維護使用傳輸資料的機密性與完整性。Authenticated streams can provide authentication, data signing, and encryption services that can help maintain the integrity and confidentiality of data transmitted using the . 由衍生自類別實作的安全性通訊協定安全性以及支援用戶端和伺服器通訊協定會決定可用於應用程式的安全性功能。The security protocol implemented by a class that derives from together with the security protocols supported on the client and server will determine the security features that are available to an application. 和類別繼承自和分別實作交涉與安全通訊端層安全性通訊協定。The and classes inherit from and implement the Negotiate and Secure Sockets Layer security protocols, respectively. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示的已驗證的資料流內容。The following code example demonstrates displaying the properties of an authenticated stream. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

para.span: 必須在衍生類別中覆寫下列成員： ， ， ， ，和。

span.span: The following members must be overridden in a derived class: , , , , and .

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定`true`如`leaveStreamOpen`參數，關閉對`innerStream`資料流。When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the has no effect on the `innerStream` stream. 這個建構函式提供經過驗證的資料流的實作器，而且只能由衍生自的類別呼叫。This constructor is provided for implementers of authenticated streams, and can be called only by classes that are derived from .

span.span: is .
-or-
is equal to .

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 當`disposing`參數為 true，這個方法的任何 managed 物件所持有的資源全部釋出這個參考。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫小心不要參考物件已處置過的早期呼叫中。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

A object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自可以使用這個屬性來存取資料流傳遞至。Classes that inherit from can use this property to access the stream passed to the .

summary.span: 取得 值，指示驗證是否成功。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether authentication was successful.

value.span: 如果驗證成功，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if successful authentication occurred; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫以執行驗證的方法繼承自的類別中定義。The methods called to perform authentication are defined in the classes that inherit from . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsEncrypted { get; }
.property instance bool IsEncrypted
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsEncrypted As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsEncrypted { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指示使用這個 傳送的資料是否加密。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether data sent using this is encrypted.

value.span: 如果在經由網路傳輸資料前對其進行加密，並在到達遠端端點時將其解密，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加密可協助保護其資料。也就是說，它有助於確保，在傳輸資料時，它無法進行解譯第三方。Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data; namely, it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsMutuallyAuthenticated { get; }
.property instance bool IsMutuallyAuthenticated
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsMutuallyAuthenticated As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsMutuallyAuthenticated { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指示伺服器和用戶端是否都已驗證。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether both server and client have been authenticated.

value.span: 如果用戶端和伺服器都已驗證，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the client and server have been authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 並非所有的安全性通訊協定支援相互驗證。Not all security protocols support mutual authentication. 若要判斷在繼承自一個類別中實作的安全性通訊協定是否支援相互驗證，檢查類別的文件。To determine whether mutual authentication is supported by the security protocol implemented in a class that inherits from , check the class documentation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsServer { get; }
.property instance bool IsServer
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsServer As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsServer { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指示連接的本機端是否以伺服器身分驗證。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the local side of the connection was authenticated as the server.

value.span: 如果本機端點以用戶端與伺服器經過驗證之連接的伺服器端身分驗證，則為 ；如果本機端點以用戶端身分驗證，則為 。

span.span: if the local endpoint was authenticated as the server side of a client-server authenticated connection; if the local endpoint was authenticated as the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 大部分用於用戶端與伺服器驗證的安全性通訊協定會定義特定的行為及需求為驗證依據您所用戶端或伺服器提供認證。Most security protocols used for client-server authentication define specific behavior and requirements for supplying credentials for authentication based on whether you are the client or the server. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract bool IsSigned { get; }
.property instance bool IsSigned
Public MustOverride ReadOnly Property IsSigned As Boolean
public: abstract property bool IsSigned { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得 值，指示使用此資料流傳送的資料是否簽章。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the data sent using this stream is signed.

value.span: 如果在傳輸資料前對其簽章，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the data is signed before being transmitted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料簽章協助保護資料的完整性也就是說，它可以協助判斷是否資料已遭竄改傳輸中的收件者。Data signing helps to protect the integrity of the data; namely, it helps the recipient determine whether the data has been tampered with while in transit. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會示範如何顯示這個屬性的值。The following code example demonstrates displaying the value of this property. [!code-cpp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CPP/NclNegoasyncClient.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[NclNegoAsyncClient#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NclNegoasyncClient/CS/client.cs#6)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool LeaveInnerStreamOpen { get; }
.property instance bool LeaveInnerStreamOpen
Public ReadOnly Property LeaveInnerStreamOpen As Boolean
public: property bool LeaveInnerStreamOpen { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 用來傳送和接收資料的資料流是否保持開啟狀態。

span.span: Gets whether the stream used by this for sending and receiving data has been left open.

value.span: 如果內部資料流保持開啟狀態，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the inner stream has been left open; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`true`，關閉此類別的執行個體之後，將不會關閉資料流傳遞至這個類別的建構函式。When set to `true`, the stream passed to the constructor of this class will not be closed after the instance of this class is closed. 當設定為`false`，關閉這個類別的執行個體也會關閉加底線的傳輸資料流。When set to `false`, closing the instance of this class will also close the underlined transport stream. 此屬性的預設值為 `false`。The default value of this property is `false`.
